unnormalised: Arre yaar, linear algebra ńelteń ńinda baḍae kana B.Tech horṭeń nelte! Iń do matrix transformations reakʼ kathateń ńinda akana mențeń mone kana. Prof. Sharma do Ch. 3 textbook reakʼ 50 ńinda leka otázkoń baḍae kana. 12/12/2022 rege exam ńelteń baḍae kana menakʼ kana menkhan honestly, iń do 40% reakʼ ńinda hoń ńindaakana. Wish doń eigenvectors और eigenvalues lekako baḍae kana menkhan. Now, doń like some hazy dream reakʼ kathateń moneakana! Maybe doń Khan Academy lekako nelteń reakʼ concept lekako baḍae kana; nelteń explain teń menaka.
normalised: Arre yaar, linear algebra doḱoń reń B-Tech hor re ńel kaḱ ṭhen ṭhakao akat́ ńinda ńel ena! Ań ńerel ńel kaḱ matrix transformations teń ńinda akata. Professor Sharma okot́e ńeda kaḱ, textbook reaḱ sumṭi aḱoḱ kaḱ questions ńinda kaḱ, Chapter three. Oḍekʼ honṭor kaḱ twelfth december two thousand and twenty two tahen exam hopon ńinda honṭor kaḱ menkhan saḱtoroń, ań ńida kaṭiń paas akana forty percent te. Ńereń kaḱ eigenvectors and eigenvalues ńida honṭor kaḱ. Aṭaḱań, en hor hoḱań sumṭi kaḱ dream oḍekʼ honṭor kaḱ! Meṭańań ńerel honṭor kaḱ Khan Academy ńinda honṭor kaḱ; ńemaḱan ńeda honṭor kaḱ.
